instructions:
Tõlgi järgmised atribuudinimed ja -väärtused eesti keelde.

                            Oluline:
                            - Arvesta toote iseloomu ja kogu läbitöödeldud konteksti (pealkiri, kirjeldus, SEO päringud, KKK), et tõlge vastaks toote tegelikele omadustele.
                            - Säilita mõõtühikud õigel kujul (cm, mm, L, W, V jne) ja arvväärtused; kasuta korrektselt eestikeelseid käändeid ja idiomaatilist sõnajärge.
                            - Ära lisa uusi tähendusi ega väärtusi; tõlgi ainult antud nimesid ja väärtusi.
                            - Iga translation-objekt PEAB sisaldama ka "attr_name" välja. Kui kind == "name", siis kasuta attr_name = source.

                            Tagasta täpselt skeemiga { translations: [ { kind: 'name'|'value', source: string, translated: string, attr_name?: string } ] }.
input: {"items": [{"kind": "name", "source": "Power source"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Power source", "source": "Electric"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Type of oven"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Type of oven", "source": "Independent"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Oven cleaning function"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Oven cleaning function", "source": "Aqua clean"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Steam type"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Steam type", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Control", "source": "Push in push out knobs (PIPO) / Touch control"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Additional information", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Automatic cooking programs", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Number of standard heating functions", "source": "8"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Microwave function"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Microwave function", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Telescopic rails", "source": "1 level"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Direction of door opening"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Direction of door opening", "source": "Regular"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Number of oven door glasses"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Number of oven door glasses", "source": "2"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Fast preheat function"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Fast preheat function", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Capacity (l)"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Capacity (l)", "source": "65"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Standardized height (cm)", "source": "60"}]}
